price: ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߘߎ߱ ߣߌ߫ ߞߎ߬ߙߎ ߟߎ߫ ߕߊ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߡߐߢߐ߲ߞߐ߫ ߞߋߟߋ߲ߘߌ߫ ߓߘߎߓߘߍ߫
arabic: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waḥumilati al-arḍu wal-jibālu fadukkatā dakkatan wāḥidatan
